General.Name: Ningxia Baofeng Energy Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningxia Baofeng Energy Group Co., Ltd. produces, processes, and sells coal mining, washing, coking, coal tar, crude benzene, C4 deep-processed, methanol, and olefin products. Its products include polyethylene, polypropylene, sulfur, ammonium sulphate, industrial naphthalene, coke, benzene, Xylene, phenol and anthracene oil, asphalt, and MTBE, as well as non-aromatic products. The company was formerly known as Ningxia Baofeng Energy Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningxia Baofeng Energy Group Co., Ltd. in January 2014. Ningxia Baofeng Energy Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Yinchuan, China.
General.Address: Baofeng Energy Circular Economy Ind Park, Yinchuan, China, 750411
